scripts.local-test: npx ts-node -e "require('./local-test-runner').runLocalTest(process.argv[2]).then(r => console.log('Result:', r)).catch(e => console.error('Error:', e))"
scripts.dev-setup: npx ts-node -e "require('./dev-utils').setupTestEnvironment().then(r => console.log('Setup complete:', r)).catch(e => console.error('Error:', e))"
scripts.docs: echo 'Documentation available in:' && echo '  - LOCAL_TESTING.md' && echo '  - ENVIRONMENT_VARIABLES.md' && echo '  - BUILD_CONFIGURATION.md' && echo '  - ../../README.md' && echo '  - ../../USAGE_EXAMPLES.md' && echo '  - ../../MIGRATION_GUIDE.md'
